name: ifporcor
body: |- wb(wif(w0, w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, w0))

stmt.origin: 3bitr3i(wif(w0, w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, w0), wo(w0, w1), wo(w1, w0))

body.origin:
|- wb(wif(w0, w0, w1), wif(w1, w1, w0))

-| wb(wo(w1, w0), wif(w1, w1, w0))
